name: 2025 the 9th International Conference on Mechanical Engineering and Robotics Research
content: PUBLICATION: Submitted paper after being strictly reviewed by organizing committee, accepted papers will be published in Conference Proceedings, which will be submitted for index by Ei Compendex and Scopus. The authors of the papers will be invited to participate in ICMERR 2025 to display their research results. A few selected papers with extended verision will be published in the International Journal of Mechanical Engineering and Robotics Research (IJMERR) and indexed by Scopus, CNKI, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
